name: Blockit In Box
description:
Block it in Box is a free arcade game compatible with all android devices.
This cool amusement is the best endless game to have in your smart devices; you will have to cage our lightening fast ring in the box, while its pace will gradually increase to the tremendous level and will drive you crazy. Let's see how high you can score in this parkour.
Install now and challenge your friends.

◆◆◆ WHAT'S INSIDE ◆◆◆

► Greenhouse Environment
► Simple, Easy and Amazing Design
► Sharing on Social Networks
► Make High Score
